body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Harper and Mary Harper. Married to Prudence Steele Harper in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1851. Father of John Harper and Jeptha Harper. Resident of Bath County in 1850. Household owned eight enslaved persons in Bath County in 1850. Farmer in Bath County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Bath County in 1860. Farmer in Bath County in 1863.
